similar.title: Treatment approach in locally advanced rectal cancer during Coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic: long course or short course?
text: Treatment approach in locally advanced rectal cancer during Coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic: long course or short course?
In this document, we briefly share the strategies and actions for patients with locally advanced rectal cancer to face the challenges of Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
